Name: S3WebsiteRedirectAllRequestsTo
Documentation: The RedirectAllRequestsTo code is an embedded property of the Amazon S3 Website Configuration Property property that describes the redirect behavior of all requests to a website endpoint of an Amazon S3 bucket.

Parameters.Name: HostName
Parameters.Documentation: Name of the host where requests are redirected.

Parameters.Name: Protocol
Parameters.Documentation: Protocol to use (http or https) when redirecting requests. The default is the protocol that is used in the original request.
